```{setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(GGally)

```
```{r}
hfi <- readr::read_csv("https://www.openintro.org/data/csv/hfi.csv")
```
```{r}
hfi %>% 
  select(ends_with("_score")) %>% 
  ggpairs()
```
```{r}
m_hr_ef <- lm(pf_score ~ hf_score + ef_score, data = hfi)
tidy(m_hr_ef)
```
```{r}
ggpairs(m_hr_ef, upper = "panel", diag = "histogram", lower = "points", axisLabels = "none")
```
```{r}
library(scatterplot3d)
scatterplot3d(hfi$pf_score, hfi$hf_score, hfi$ef_score, 
              type = "h", pch = 20, color = "blue")
```
```{r}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(hfi, x = ~pf_score, y = ~hf_score, z = ~ef_score, 
        type = "scatter3d", mode = "markers", size = 5)
```
